titleStmt.title: A funerall sermon preached at the obsequies of the Right Hon[oura]ble and most vertuous Lady, the Lady Frances, Countesse of Carbery who deceased October the 9th, 1650, at her house Golden-Grove in Carmarthen-shire / by Jer. Taylor ...
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
